title: Nebula armor
summaries: Nebula armor is a post-Moon Lord armor set that provides magic weapon boosts. It is currently the final magic set available on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version. Crafting this set requires a total of 36 Luminite Bars (144 Luminite) and 45 Nebula Fragments.
A full set of the Nebula armor will provide the following benefits:

• +60 maximum mana
  • +26% magic damage
  • +16% magic critical strike chance
  • âˆ’15% mana usage
  • +10% movement speed

Additionally, equipping the full set grants a chance that special booster items will appear when striking enemies with <linked>magic weapons</linked>. Each booster grants a buff that lasts 8 seconds and causes a spark effect to float around the player. When a booster item is picked up while an identical buff is already in effect, it stacks with the previous buff, for up to 3 stacked boosts. Every 8 seconds, one stacked booster expires and the buff decreases by one level. Booster items float in the air and have a greater pickup range than most items.

In <linked>multiplayer</linked>, any player can pick up these booster items and benefit from their buffs, even if they are not wearing Nebula armor. Additionally, picking up a booster item will grant nearby players (within a 43.75-tile radius) one instance of the buff. If the player acquiring the booster is on a <linked>team</linked>, only other players within that team will obtain the buff; otherwise, unaffiliated players will spread the buff to all other nearby players upon obtaining a booster.
